original_solution_mapping.L1: Twice the number of participants in 2018 is 150 participants x 2 = <<150*2=300>>300 participants.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The number of participants in 2019 was 300 participants + 20 participants = <<300+20=320>>320 participants.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Half the number of participants in 2019 is 320 participants /2 = <<320/2=160>>160 participants.
original_solution_mapping.L4: The number of participants in 2020 was 160 participants - 40 participants = <<160-40=120>>120 participants.
original_solution_mapping.L5: There were 320 participants - 120 participants = <<320-120=200>>200 more participants in 2019 than in 2020.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4913.
    Returns: the difference in participants between 2019 and 2020.
    """
    # L1
    participants_2018 = 150 # number of participants in the 2018 Science Quiz Bowl was 150
    twice_multiplier = 2 # WK
    twice_participants_2018 = participants_2018 * twice_multiplier

    # L2
    more_than_twice = 20 # 20 more than twice the number of participants in 2019
    participants_2019 = twice_participants_2018 + more_than_twice

    # L3
    half_divisor = 2 # WK
    half_participants_2019 = participants_2019 / half_divisor

    # L4
    less_than_half = 40 # 40 less than half the number of participants in 2019
    participants_2020 = half_participants_2019 - less_than_half

    # L5
    difference_2019_2020 = participants_2019 - participants_2020

    # FA
    answer = difference_2019_2020
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Twice the number of participants in 2018 is {participants_2018} participants x {twice_multiplier} = <<{participants_2018}*{twice_multiplier}={twice_participants_2018}>>{twice_participants_2018} participants.

The number of participants in 2019 was {twice_participants_2018} participants + {more_than_twice} participants = <<{twice_participants_2018}+{more_than_twice}={participants_2019}>>{participants_2019} participants.
Half the number of participants in 2019 is {participants_2019} participants /{half_divisor} = <<{participants_2019}/{half_divisor}={half_participants_2019}>>{half_participants_2019} participants.

The number of participants in 2020 was {half_participants_2019} participants - {less_than_half} participants = <<{half_participants_2019}-{less_than_half}={participants_2020}>>{participants_2020} participants.

There were {participants_2019} participants - {participants_2020} participants = <<{participants_2019}-{participants_2020}={difference_2019_2020}>>{difference_2019_2020} more participants in 2019 than in 2020.
